ygData.subject: Re: spells
ygData.msgSnippet: ... well, something is better than nothing. i think i have the plat to burn on it, why not i guess =) ... i _think_ i saw it on a vendor in the freeport magic
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:10 AM 5/26/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
>

>
>Not much for Mist, but its something and every little bit helps. I don't use
>debuffs that often unless I'm grouped with another enchanter, so I can't
>answer that question.
>

well, something is better than nothing. i think i have the plat to burn on
it, why not i guess =)

>
>Color Shift is apparently a research only spell because I have been
>unsuccessful in finding and am not really sure what the total effect is. I
>*think* it's probably an improved version of Color Flux, but I'm not sure.
>

i _think_ i saw it on a vendor in the freeport magic guild. i never used
color flux, is it a useful stun spell?

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 20th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
